meanings.definition: Harmful or destructive in a subtle or gradual way
meanings.sent1: The baneful influence of peer pressure led him down the wrong path.
meanings.sent2: The baneful habit of procrastination slowly affected her grades.
meanings.sent3: The baneful whispers of gossip spread like wildfire in the small town.
meanings.sent4: The baneful mold in the damp basement silently crept up the walls.
meanings.sent5: The baneful routine of skipping breakfast took a toll on her health over time.
